name: Interactive Components for Website Transitions
description:
Interactive Components for Animating Website Transitions


This is a working example of how interactive components can be used to establish standard webpage interactions/transitions in a working prototype.


I’ve left notes throughout the Prototype page, however if you have any additional questions, feel free to DM me at @reathchris on Twitter and I’ll look to get back to you at the earliest convenience. If you see any orphans/widows, no you didn’t.
